community_4. wankecheng is located at No. 2 Court, Tianhe West Road, Daxing District, Beijing. Constructed with the latest eco-friendly materials, this community prioritizes sustainability while ensuring comfort and luxury. The tall silver pine trees, from which the community gets its name, dot the skyline and provide refreshing shade during the summer months. Residents can benefit from the meticulously landscaped gardens, which are interspersed with cozy seating areas and beautiful water features. The community center offers various activities, fostering a sense of camaraderie among neighbors. Despite its secluded location, Silver Pine Heights remains connected to the city through efficient transport networks, making daily commutes and weekend getaways equally convenient.. This commnunity is surrounded by: The subway includes Huangcun Railway Station and Huangcun West Street; supermarkets include vegetable supermarkets and Wumart Supermarket (Daxing Huangcun store); shopping malls include Daxing Dayue Chunfengli and Daxing Star City Commercial Building; hospitals include Xingzheng Town, Daxing District, Beijing Dongli Community Health Service Station, Jingnan Hospital of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Daxing District, Beijing; Parks include Street Center Park; Schools include Beijing Daxing District No. 1 Middle School, Beijing Daxing District No. 8 Primary School; restaurants include Bantian Yao Green Pepper Grilled Fish (Daxing Hotel Store), Jingmen Laobao San (Guanyin Temple Store); banks include Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (Beijing Daxing Branch), Industrial and Commercial Bank of China ATM (Beijing Daxing Branch)..
